cause.description:
Youth suffer under a double standard of having adult responsibilities but not rights
Youth pay taxes, live under our laws, they should have the vote
Lowering the Voting Age will increase voter turnout
If we let stupid adults vote, why not let smart youth vote?
There are no wrong votes
please visit this site http://www.youthrights.org/vote10.php
1. Democracy requires the right to vote for its citizens
2. Teens pay taxes but do not get to vote. who remembers why we had a revolutionary war?
cause.mission: lower voting age, or come up with a better way to regulate voting
cause.name: ANTI VOTING AGE
